top:

and liquidate it using DAO (Decentralized Autonomous Organization).
Users can play in various blockchain ecosystems like Defi with this token.

press: 해외 및 국내 ELYSIA 프로토콜 관련 소식.
ELYSIA to Be the First in Asia That Obtains Approval as a DAO LLC in Wyoming, USA

SINGAPORE, February 07, 2022--(BUSINESS WIRE)- ELYSIA, a blockchain project specializing in real estate tokenization and securitization, will be the first organization in Asia to be registered as a DAO LLC (Limited Liability Company) in Wyoming, USA
엘리시아, 美 와이오밍주 탈중앙화자율조직(DAO) 법인으로 등록 ··· 세계에서 두 번째
엘리시아가 아시아 최초로 미국 와이오밍주 탈중앙화 자율조직(DAO, Decentralized Autonomous Organization) 법인으로 등록됐다고 7일 밝혔다. 와이오밍주 정부가 공인한 세계 두 번째 다오다.
安居客迎来首家韩国房地产公司爱立厦入驻
日前,安居客迎来首家韩国房地产公司入驻,爱立厦(Elysia)正式进入中国市场。爱立厦(Elysia)的房地产产品就主要集中于首尔江南区和首尔地铁二号线附近

governance.title: ELYSIA Governance
section_first: ELYSIA is a DAO LLC owned and operated by EL Token stakers.
ELYSIA DAO develops a tokenization protocol so that real assets can be used in digital asset markets such as DeFi and NFT marketplaces.
The world's second DAO LLC qualified by the US government
DAO LLC established first among listed projects.
section_second:
ELYSIA token represents ownership of ELYSIA DAO LLC.
and is listed on DEX and CEX with many EL tokens so that anyone
interested in ELYSIA and the future can participate in governance.
It represents the total quantity of created EL tokens.
It represents the quantity minus the burned quantity from the total created.
Out of the total supply, it represents the quantity that is circulating in the market or held in a personal wallet so that it can be traded directly on the market.
section_third: To participate in the decision-making process, users must have the right to vote (staked EL, sEL). Users can get the right to vote by staking EL tokens on the EL staking, and they can cast their votes as much as they have.
The staking period is until ELYSIA 2.0 opens, and users can unstake at any time.
For EL staking, change the network of the connected wallet to ‘Ethereum Mainnet’.
prev_staking:
The previous EL staking program was held for 7 rounds from 2021.07.27 to 2022.04.17 KST.
Only users who have remaining staked during this period can see. Users who want to unstake and receive rewards,
please connect your wallet.
There is no amount of EL tokens staked.
section_fourth: Develop ELYSIA together by sharing, discussing, and proposing your opinions!

Anyone who agrees with the ELYSIA Protocol or wants to participate in ELYSIA’s development can participate in governance.
Participants are free to propose improvements in the ELYSIA forum and vote on the decision-making process in the snapshot.

The ELYSIA forum is an important part of the ELYSIA governance system and is intended to nurture ELYSIA's ecosystem. As part of the ‘off-chain cycle’, Forum is a place where participants are free to propose and discuss initiatives, and to share resources and information.

Snapshot is a space to complete off-chain governance and decide whether or not to pass on an agenda that requires a final decision. The sEL tokens obtained by staking EL serve as voting rights, and participants can exercise their rights as much as the sEL they hold.

connect_wallet:
A wallet connection is required for staking.
Do you want to connect?
indicator: An approvement transaction is being processed.
Confirm this transaction in your wallet
transaction: You can check the progress of the transaction in the upper right corner.
approve: In order to deposit to the money pool, you need to approve access so that the app can access the connected wallet.
Approval is required only at the time of initial deposit, and upon successful completion of the approvement, deposits can be made without subsequent approval process.
* Approval of access rights is also a transaction using the network, so gas charges occur.

top: Move Real world asset into the digital world
EL Bridge provides a real asset tokenization function so that users can utilize real assets in the blockchain financial ecosystem.
whitepaper: The detailed tokenization process can be found in the ELYSIA whitepaper.
nft_description: In a financial system using blockchain technology, a digital original that matches assets in the real world 1:1 is required,
digital original is made in the form of an NFT and can be used as a certificate in transactions on the blockchain.
asset_nft_description: Why Real estate NFT is needed?

Recently, many real world assets (art works, copyrighted creations, etc.) have been made with NFTs and are being actively traded on the blockchain. These NFTs can be used in various financial systems without fear of forgery because transaction details are securely recorded on the blockchain.

Despite the convenience of such transactions and the liquidity of the inflow of funds, there has not been a case of converting real world estate into NFT and incorporating it into the existing blockchain financial system. This is because the barriers to entry are high in the real estate market, even in the traditional financial market, where complex documents are required and large amounts of money are exchanged. ELYSIA DAO LLC. intends to create the world's first real estate NFT-based economic system based on its experience of trading multiple real estate and operating a separate blockchain technology team.

Real world asset-based NFTs may have the following uses.
1. Real world asset-based NFT collateralized loan on DeFi
2. Swap between real estate NFT and virtual currency
3. Raising investment using DAO
inquiry_nft: Please feel free to contact us regarding real estate NFT issuance through the form below. (*Terminology related to the EL bridge may change later.)
step1: Please select the type of real estate you want to create (to tokenize) with NFT!

Principal and interest receivables
(ABToken - b type)
* If you do not find the type of real asset you want among the options above, please enter it in '5. Others'.
step2: Please choose where you would like to use your NFT!
* If you do not find the NFT application you want among the options above, please enter it in '5. Others'.
step3: Please enter the address of the real estate you want to make into NFT (to be tokenized).
ex) 29, Nambusunhwan-ro 200ga-gil, Gwanak-gu, Seoul, Republic of Korea
step5: I consent to ELYSIA PLATFORM PTE. LTD processing my personal information as set out in the Privacy Policy and Cookie Policy and that, given the global nature of ELYSIA PLATFORM PTE. LTD's business, such processing may take place outside of my home jurisdiction.
